page.title: 10EAST GRINSTEAD EATING OUT
page.content: Eating out in pubs, snack bars and restaurants has become an integral part of life today. The High St and adjoining areas have numerous facilities both for lunches for the the workers in the shops and offices around, and for eating out in the evening. The four pubs on the High St provide a range of lunchtime food from jumbo sausage and French bread for 80p, to Sunday roast for 495p. There is also a take away sandwich bar and a fish and chip shop where cod & chips costss about 120p. There are 4 restaurants on the High St an indian, a vegatarian and 2 traditional English establishments, one of whoch also includes Grek dishes on its menu. The Dorset Arms also has a dining room and they concentrate on steaks for around 650p.
